import React from 'react'; import Pdf from "react-to-pdf"; const ref=React.createRef() const PDF=(props)=>{ return( <>
    FORM - 3 [rule 4 (1)]
    AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIMANT/ PARENT(S)
    (Rule 4, Order 18 of the Code of Civil Procedure, 1908)
    I, .. Rafique Jabbar Shah son / daughter of Shri/Smt.Jabbar Shah aged 28 years, Occupation Student residing at .Nandri village/Town…Amalner,Tahsil…Jalgaon Disrictt Maharashtra State here by Solemnly affirm as under 2. I hereby give the genealogy tree of my family and relatives, which is as under: - 3. Other relevant submissions to be made or any essential explanation to be made, in support of Caste /Tribe claim, including the sociology, anthropological and ethnological (anthropological moorings and ethnology kinship), genetical traits, of the Caste/Tribes, if any; To the best of my knowledge and be lief the information given in application FORM -1 and in this affidavit is based on facts and is correct. Identifier Details- I Mr. Harschel Joshi. Resident at Amalner, Tal. Amalner, Dist. Jalgaon. Before me, Shri. Rafiq Jabbar Shah has given his signature and thumbprint and I declare that I know him personally. Harshal Joshi VERIFICATION It is certified that Mr. Rafiq Jabbar Shah signed and took oath before me. Harshal Joshi, Personally identified, whose signed affidavit has been affixed to me. Verified on 05/10/2017 at Amalner that the contents of the above mentioned affidavit is true and correct and nothing material has been concealed. Place : Amalner. (Sign. Before Me) Date : 05.10.2017. Executive Magistrate Amalner
{({ toPdf })=>}
) } export default PDF;
